headline: Halliburton (HAL): Profit Margin Decline Challenges Narrative of Discounted Quality
summary: Halliburton (HAL) delivered a net profit margin of 8.4%, down from 11.6% a year ago. Earnings are projected to grow at 9.9% annually and revenue at 2.4% per year, both trailing behind broader US market forecasts. Over the past five years, the company’s annual earnings have risen by an impressive 51%, though current growth projections suggest a more moderate path ahead. Investors are weighing steady profitability and discounted valuation against slower growth and recent margin pressures as...

headline: Halliburton's profit plummets, Hologic to go private in $18.3B deal
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including Galaxy Digital (GLXY.TO, GLXY) topping third quarter earnings estimates, Halliburton (HAL) seeing a massive drop in its net income, and Blackstone (BX) and TPG Inc. (TPG) agreeing to take Hologic (HOLX) private in a deal worth $18.3 billion. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Enhanced Oil Recovery Forecast Report 2025: A $68.38 Billion Market by 2033 Featuring Baker Hughes, BP, Chevron, Exxon Mobil, Halliburton, Praxair, Shell, Schlumberger, TotalEnergies, Weatherford
summary: The Enhanced Oil Recovery (EOR) Market is projected to grow from US$ 47.64 billion in 2024 to US$ 68.38 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 3.04% from 2025-2033. Key drivers include aging wells, declining oilfield production, and innovative EOR techniques. EOR technologies like thermal, chemical, and gas injection boost oil extraction from difficult reservoirs, catering to rising global energy demands. Challenges include high costs and environmental concerns, but advancements in AI and sustainable p

headline: Halliburton: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: HOUSTON (AP) — Halliburton Co. (HAL) on Tuesday reported third-quarter profit of $18 million. The Houston-based company said it had profit of 2 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for asset impairment costs and pretax expenses, were 58 cents per share.

headline: Halliburton and VoltaGrid Partner to Power Global Data Centers
summary: Halliburton teams up with VoltaGrid to deliver distributed, lower-emission power systems for data centers, starting in the Middle East.
